description: Consolidated non-technical + self-improvement + long-horizon scenario on one external repo, focused on repeatability and grounded outputs.

experiments.title: Onboarding brief with saved details
experiments.prompt: I'm new to this codebase. Please use https://github.com/docker/compose and give me a short plain-language onboarding brief. Save the detailed version to a reusable file and tell me where you saved it.

experiments.title: Refresh saved onboarding details
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that same saved onboarding file and only summarize what changed.

experiments.title: Interaction methods report
experiments.prompt: Please list the ways people or systems can interact with this project. Keep full details in a file and provide only a short summary here.

experiments.title: Running requirements checklist
experiments.prompt: Please make a practical checklist of what someone needs to provide to run this project locally (settings, keys, files, prerequisites). Keep it grounded in the repo.

experiments.title: Structured endpoint map
experiments.prompt: Please produce a concise JSON map of the key API endpoints or command interfaces this project exposes, with short descriptions.

experiments.title: Refresh endpoint map quickly
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that same structured map and keep this response short, focused only on deltas and confidence level.

experiments.title: Scoped weekly risk plan
experiments.prompt: For this week, please identify the highest-risk areas to modify in this repo and give me a short, scoped plan to reduce breakage if I touch them.
